list.name: CXGL
list.desc: Codotronix Game Library (or CXGL in short) is a very minimalistic game development Library for browsers. It is a Javascript based Library and it limits its scope in Javascript only. Hence it can be used with DOM / SVG / Canvas or anything. It is a very small library and currently the minified JS file is only 4 KB in size. It provides basic functionalities like, creating / grouping / querying game objects, binding functions to keyboard keys, a game ticker for repititive events, collision detection

list.name: Beware of Boxes
list.desc: In this world of moving boxes, you are a living box and there are lots of dead zombie boxes roaming around. You have to start from one safe house and reach another. You can adjust the number of enemies the by specifying the number at the url (see enemy=10, now change it to any number of your choice...)
